title: AD exits dominant debut with lower-body injury
description: Anthony Davis exited his debut for the Dallas Mavericks early after suffering what the team called a "lower-body injury."
author: Tim MacMahon

title: Florida upends another No. 1 as Auburn stumbles
description: The Gators, who blew out then-No. 1 Tennessee at home in January, rallied from an early deficit and held off top-ranked Auburn 90-81 on Saturday.

title: Cool heads and bloody minds combine as England pluck victory from chaos
description: It was a finale that defied logic and order, but, for the first time in a long time, England found a way through the final-quarter maelstrom to victory.

title: 'I'm happy it was like that' - so was FA Cup better without VAR?
description: The debate over the use of technology in football is nothing new - but in the FA Cup fourth round its absence has provided a frequent talking point.

title: England turn corner to ignite Six Nations title chances
FA Cup talking points: Chelsea's nightmare after Christmas continues
'Nothing serious': AD not worried after suffering injury in Mavericks debut
description: Anthony Davis exited the game with a lower-body injury after exploding for 26 points, 16 rebounds, seven assists and three blocks in 31 minutes.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Lakers without LeBron or Luka get career-high 45 points from Austin Reaves in win over Pacers
description: ESPN flexed the Lakers game to its Saturday broadcast schedule in anticpation of Luka Dončić making his debut. Instead, Austin Reaves was the star.
author: Yahoo Sports
